comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Driving Horses, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Hi, Martina V.:  We received your request to have a Library of Congress photo added to your group: Driving Horses. Please click on the "Invite this photo to..." link below the comment box and we'll accept it.

comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: This was likely taken at the judging of the annual Horse Show of the Plainfield Riding and Driving Club at Plainfield, N.J. "Ladies to Drive" was a specific class of competition. – New York Times

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started an entry in Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Plainfield_Riding_and_Driving_Club
